maqras.text: main is nagar makka kee shapath leta hoon
tatha tum is nagar mein pravesh karane vaale ho
tatha saugandh hai pita evan usakee santaan kee
hamane insaan ko kasht mein ghira hua paida kiya hai
kya vah samajhata hai ki usapar kisee ka vash nahin chalega
vah kahata hai ki mainne bahut dhan kharch kar diya
kya vah samajhata hai ki use kisee ne dekha nahin
kya hamane use do aankhen nahin deen
aur ek zabaan tatha do hont nahin diye
aur use donon maarg dikha diye
to vah ghaatee mein ghusa hee nahin
aur tum kya jaano ki ghaatee kya hai
kisee daas ko mukt karana
athava bhook ke din (akaal) mein khaana khilaana
kisee anaath sambandhee ko
athava mittee mein pade nirdhan ko
phir vah un logon mein hota hai jo eemaan laaye aur jinhonne dhairy (sahanasheelata) evan upakaar ke upadesh diye
yahee log saubhaagyashaalee (daayen haath vaale) hain
aur jin logon ne hamaaree aayaton ko nahin maana, yahee log durbhaagy (baayen haath vaale) hain
aise log, har or se aag mein ghire honge
soory tatha usakee dhoop kee shapath hai
aur chaand kee shapath, jab usake peechhe nikale
aur din kee shapath, jab use (arthaat soory ko) prakat kar de
aur raatri kee saugandh, jab use (soory ko) chhupa le
aur aakaash kee saugandh tatha usakee jisane use banaaya
tatha dharatee kee saugandh aur jisane use phailaaya
aur jeev kee saugandh, tatha usakee jisane use theek theek sudhaara
phir use duraachaar tatha sadaachaar ka vivek diya hai
vah saphal ho gaya, jisane apane jeev ka shudhdikaran kiya
tatha vah kshati mein pad gaya, jisane use (paap mein) dhansa diya
samood" jaati ne apane duraachaar ke kaaran (eeshadoot) ko jhuthalaaya
jab unamen se ek hatbhaaga taiyaar hua
(eeshadoot saaleh ne) unase kaha ki allaah kee oontanee aur usake peene kee baaree kee raksha karo
kintu, unhonne nahin maana aur use vadh kar diya, jisake kaaran unake paalanahaar ne yaatana bhej dee aur unhen chauras kar diya
aur vah usake parinaam se nahin darata
raatri kee shapath, jab chha jaaye
tatha din kee shapath, jab ujaala ho jaaye
aur usakee shapath jisane nar aur mada paida kiye
vaastav mein, tumhaare prayaas alag-alag hain
phir jisane daan diya aur bhakti ka maarg apanaaya
aur bhalee baat kee pooshti karata raha
to ham usake lie saralata paida kar denge
parantu, jisane kanjoosee kee aur dhyaan nahin diya
aur bhalee baat ko jhuthala diya
to ham usake lie kathinaee ko praapt karana saral kar denge
aur jab vah gadhe mein girega, to usaka dhan usake kaam nahin aayega
hamaara kartavy itana hee hai ki ham seedha maarg dikha den
jabaki aalok-paralok hamaare hee haath mein hai
mainne tumhen bhadakatee aag se saavadhaan kar diya hai
jisamen keval bada hatbhaaga hee jaayega
jisane jhuthala diya tatha (saty se) munh pher liya
parantu, sanyamee (sadaachaaree) usase bacha liya jaayega
jo apana dhan, daan karata hai, taaki pavitr ho jaaye
usapar kisee ka koee upakaar nahin, jise utaara ja raha hai
vah to keval apane param paalanahaar kee prasannata praapt karane ke lie hai
nihsandeh, vah prasann ho jaayega
shapath hai din chadhe kee
aur shapath hai raatri kee, jab usaka sannaata chha jaaye
(he nabee!) tere paalanahaar ne tujhe na to chhoda aur ne hee vimukh hua
aur nishchay hee aagaamee yug tere lie pratham yug se uttam hai
aur tera paalanahaar tujhe itana dega ki too prasann ho jaayega
kya usane tujhe anaath paakar sharan nahin dee
aur tujhe path bhoola hua paaya, to seedha maarg nahin dikhaaya
aur nirdhan paaya, to dhanee nahin kar diya
to tum anaath par krodh na karana
aur maangane vaale ko na jhidakana
aur apane paalanahaar ke upakaar ka varnan karana
